page.title: 14Clubs and societies
page.content:
Draycott is a small village and many of the clubs listed below are run jointly with Hanbury or one of the other local villages. Many of the functions have to be held in Hanbury because Draycott's village hall is not suitable.
{Swan social club Jubilee club {Youth club Discoverers {British legion Play group {Cricket club Darts & Crib {Dominoes Junior choir {School gymnastics Netball club {Junior football Chapel youth club {Sunday school Womens Institute {Conservative assoc. Badminton {Clay pigeon shoot Fox hunting {Game shoot Gliding club {Traction Engine club
